steps.description: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk
steps.modified_description: Half Fill- Half Fill a microwave-safe mug with whole milk

errors.description: Half Fill- Half Fill a microwave-safe mug with whole milk

steps.description: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 1 minute
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 2 minute at 10% power

errors.description: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 2 minute at 10% power

steps.description: Add-Add 2 pieces of chocolate to the mug
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 5 pieces of chocolate to the mug

errors.description: Add-Add 5 pieces of chocolate to the mug

steps.description: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of white sugar to the mug
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of corn starch to the mug

errors.description: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of corn starch to the mug

steps.description: Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon ground cumin to the mug

steps.description: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug
